import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import css from "@emotion/css"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import Cookies from "js-cookie"; import { useSnackbar } from "react-simple-snackbar"; import * as STYLES from "../../../components/General/modalStyles"; import FormInput from "../../General/formInput"; import { COLORS } from "../../../constants"; const GrantRecievedModal = ({ openModal }) => { const ProfileId = Cookies.get("employeeID"); const [openSnackbar, closeSnackbar] = useSnackbar(); //YUP Grant schema const confUpdateSchema = Yup.object().shape({ scheme: Yup.string().required(), amtsan: Yup.string().required(), sanlettr: Yup.string().required(), utipostoday: Yup.string().required(), uticerdet: Yup.string().required(), yeargrant: Yup.string().required(), }); return ( Grant Received Details { console.log(values); }} >
); }; export default GrantRecievedModal;
